issue.title: [Python] Separate tests into its own conda package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10104](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10104). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently ship the tests with the source code. This is nice to test the integrity of the installation, it is not needed for runtime though. In the case of conda, the overhead to turn them into a separate package is small.
